chqbook - Manager - Contact Center - Insurance

Location - Bengaluru, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time

Sales July 01, 2022

Job Description:

Manager Contact Centre

Location

BANGALORE

Experience

7 to 10 Years of experience in managing a sales contact centre.

What will your role look like?

  • Set up a best in class Contact Centre (Outbound and Inbound – Voice and Non-Voice) offering best in class insurance products to Chqbook customers.
    • 
  • Impact on the entire lifecycle of a customer includes telesales, contact centre operations, complaint management, cross-selling and upselling, reducing customer churn and managing the cost of service.
    • 
  • Achievement of ambitious sales targets by timely planning and execution of sales programs.
  • Innovate and create operating efficiency and yield improvement enhancing opportunities to increase revenue.
  • Manage adequate staffing and scheduling by recruiting the right resources who are revenue-oriented and high on integrity. Be a trainer, coach and motivator.
    • 
  • This role is a P&L responsibility and the incumbent will closely work with the senior management.

Who are we looking for?

  • Reasonable knowledge and understanding of banking and insurance products (Loans, Credit Cards etc).
  • Experience in Outbound Sales Contact Centre Management and Operations Management.
  • Must have past experience of managing a direct telesales team of minimum of 50 employees
  • Understanding of telesales channel, caller dynamics and multiple access channels.
  • Deep understanding of call centre tools, systems and processes especially CRM, ACD, CTI, and Chat tools.
  • Strong delivery focus and end result orientation
  • Strong conception skills to conceive, build and execute strategies, problem-solving and providing at scale while keeping in mind the reality of day to day deliverables.
  • Strong bias towards customer satisfaction and empowerment.
  • Maximum age: 35 years

chqbook - Sales Manager - Insurance(General Insurance -Motor/Health Insurance)

Job Overview:

The Sales Manager will be responsible for handling the CSOs based out of Chqbook Partner stores. These CSOs through direct interaction with customers will pitch and sell Motor Insurance, health insurance, life insurance and other financial products. Sales Managers will be responsible for driving productivity of each store as per agreed numbers. Sales Manages to be highly motivated people with confidence, integrity, knowledge and problem solving.
